behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Well...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: You look to be Unkindled.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: No bell tolls, and yet, you've slipped into the painting?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Oh, no matter.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: If you've lost your way, the words of Lady Friede will guide you.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Now, go on inside. Show respect, and listen carefully.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time, after attaining 5 or more Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: Well, well...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time, after attaining 5 or more Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: You're Lady Yuria's Lord of Hollows.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time, after attaining 5 or more Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: No bell tolls, and yet, you've slipped into the painting?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time, after attaining 5 or more Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: Oh, no matter.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time, after attaining 5 or more Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: If you've lost your way, the words of Lady Friede will guide you.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time, after attaining 5 or more Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: Now, go on inside. Show respect, and listen carefully.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: What's keeping you? Go on, right inside.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Show respect, and let Lady Friede speak to you.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after talking to Sister Friede
subdialogue_text: Lady Friede has spoken, has she not?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after talking to Sister Friede
subdialogue_text: Then tarry no longer and begone.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after talking to Sister Friede
subdialogue_text: There is one thing you should know.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after talking to Sister Friede
subdialogue_text: Inside the cold painting, curiosity could be your cross...

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after talking to Sister Friede
subdialogue_text:
Stray from the withering flame,
and the snow will swallow you whole.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after talking to Sister Friede
#0Talk-1st time after talking to Sister Friede, attaining 5 or more Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: Lady Friede has spoken, has she not?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after talking to Sister Friede, attaining 5 or more Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: Then tarry no longer and begone.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after talking to Sister Friede, attaining 5 or more Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: Carry on, for Lady Yuria, and for Londor.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked
subdialogue_text: Why you miserable, mad Hollow.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked
subdialogue_text: You're nothing, without a bell to guide your way.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked
#0Upon being attacked, after the protagonist has attained 5 or more Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: Why you miserable, mad Hollow.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked, after the protagonist has attained 5 or more Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: What is Lady Yuria thinking...

behavior: #0Upon appearing after being approached & made hostile
subdialogue_text: I've seen your kind, time and time again.

behavior: #0Upon appearing after being approached & made hostile
subdialogue_text:
Every fleeing man must be caught. Every secret must be unearthed.
Such is the conceit of the self-proclaimed seeker of truth.

behavior: #0Upon appearing after being approached & made hostile
subdialogue_text: But in the end, you lack the stomach.

behavior: #0Upon appearing after being approached & made hostile
subdialogue_text: For the agony that you'll bring upon yourself...

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist
subdialogue_text: I trust you've learned your lesson...

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist
subdialogue_text: Inside the cold painting, curiosity could be your cross...

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: Forgive me, my Lady...

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: I swore an oath, but I have failed you...

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: ...Lady Elfriede...

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: ##Now, go on ahead. Show respect, and listen carefully.

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: ##What's keeping you? Go on, straight ahead.
